message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. I think this is a fair price given its value to you. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,800. I'm willing to pay a premium for the product, but I'm trying to stay within a certain budget. Can you meet me halfway?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints.  While I value the product at significantly more, I'm willing to come down to $11,100. This is a fair compromise that still allows me to recoup a good portion of the product's value. Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll offer $10,950. Can you consider that?
